h2.span: How to Start the Calculator App

div.p: Here you will find information on how to start the Caclulator app on your mobile phone.

section.p: To use the calculator app, you need to unlock your phone first.
You can use a calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful, when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

li.span: Navigate to the Calculator application icon.

section.p: The application starts. You are now ready to calculate with it.

div.section: For example, if you have purchased a book for 5$ and you have given 10$, how much change should you expect? Answer is 10-5=5 $ change.
